details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.11 Metadata - 8.11.1 General - Metadata key in the Catalog
details.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3
